remarks: Distributive law for Hilbert space inner product.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hlipdir.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
hlipdir.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
hlipdir.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
hlipdir $p |- ( ( U e. CHilOLD /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) P C ) = ( ( A P C ) + ( B P C ) ) ) $.
